rows.label: qst700905_msg0001
rows.name:
That was a surprise. I
wonder what that was.

rows.label: qst700905_msg0002
rows.name:
Hey, didn't we get covered
in Gogols like this before?
Is it just a coincidence?

rows.label: qst700905_msg0003
rows.name: I can't be that optimistic.

rows.label: qst700905_msg0004
rows.name:
They must be remnants of
the Gogols we fought before.
They've got some nerve.

rows.label: qst700905_msg0005
rows.name:
Yeah, they didn't seem to be
targeting the city. That's
a reasonable assumption.

rows.label: qst700905_msg0006
rows.name: U-Uwaa...

rows.label: qst700905_msg0007
rows.name:
Hmph, we've become quite
popular without even noticing.

rows.label: qst700905_msg0008
rows.name:
Sorry to keep you waiting!
Is everyone okay!?

rows.label: qst700905_msg0009
rows.name: As you can see, we're perfectly fine.

rows.label: qst700905_msg0010
rows.name:
Gahahaha! It seems there was
no need for us to come out.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00011
rows.name:
Anyway, you all did a great job.
Agate, you did well to inform us.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00012
rows.name:
How about it? Care to join
my squad? I can always use
more excellent soldiers.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00013
rows.name:
That's a wonderful invitation,
but... what are you going to do
about guarding this place?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00014
rows.name: Gahahaha, that's right.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00015
rows.name:
Hmm, then how about we return
Chalced to gate duty and
welcome Agate into my squad?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00016
rows.name:
Wait a minute. Can't they be
together? You need as many excellent
soldiers as you can get, right?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00017
rows.name:
Guarding the gate, the key
to the capital's defense, is
not a job for just anyone.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00018
rows.name:
I really want one of these
brothers to remain here.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00019
rows.name:
Then there's no need to think.
I'm fine, so take my brother...

rows.label: qst700905_msg00020
rows.name:
...You're doing that "good
boy" act again. I hate that
about you, Nii-san.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00021
rows.name: Chalced?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00022
rows.name:
You think you can just give everything
to me, don't you? Because you're the
older brother, it's natural?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00023
rows.name:
Only you are happy doing
that. I'm sick of it.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00024
rows.name: I'm sorry, but please let me say this.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00025
rows.name:
Is it okay to turn your back now?
If a battle happens tomorrow, you
might never see each other again.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00026
rows.name:
If that happens, I think
you'll regret it.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00028
rows.name:
...You're right. Peaceful days
don't just come naturally.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00029
rows.name:
I just learned that a
moment ago. I'm sorry.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00030
rows.name: I, too... said a bit too much.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00031
rows.name:
Squad Leader, I have a
request. Could you demote me?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00032
rows.name:
I want to cool my head and start
over from gate duty again.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00033
rows.name: Oh? So sudden again. Are you serious?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00034
rows.name:
Yes. We don't know when another
attack like this one might happen.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00035
rows.name:
And if my brother is alone, I'd
be worried about many things.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00036
rows.name:
Well... you've got some
nerve, haven't you?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00037
rows.name:
...So please stop treating me like a
little brother. From now on, I want you
to work with me as a fellow guard.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00038
rows.name:
I've worked this hard to
share the burden with you.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00039
rows.name: I'm sorry. Until now, I...

rows.label: qst700905_msg00040
rows.name:
You're a fool, Nii-san. In times
like these, "thank you" is enough.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00041
rows.name: Uuh, sniff... I'm so glad...

rows.label: qst700905_msg00042
rows.name: Oh, you're hopeless.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00043
rows.name:
Even if more Gogols come,
you'll be fine now, right?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00044
rows.name:
Please, give me a break. I'm
not a fan of brutish types.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00045
rows.name:
Gahahaha, well, in any case,
I'm relieved to have such
excellent gate guards. Right?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00046
rows.name:
Haa, I'll have to recruit squad
members from scratch again.
